reporter_caption.center: TRUSTEES OF 1ST PRESBYTERIAN v. HOWARD COMPANY-JEWELERS, 11 N.J. 411 (1953)

caption.center: THE TRUSTEES OF THE FIRST PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH IN NEWARK,
PLAINTIFF-PETITIONER, v. THE HOWARD COMPANY-JEWELERS, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Superior Court, Appellate Division.
opinion.attorneys:
Messrs. Riker, Emery Danzig for the petitioner.
Messrs. Osborne, Cornish Scheck for the respondent.
